Name: Pear (PH)
Description: A crisp fall fruit. The wood of the pear tree is the main wood used in woodwind instruments.

DescriptionLocalization.es: A crisp fall fruit. The wood of the pear tree is the main wood used in woodwind instruments.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: A crisp fall fruit. The wood of the pear tree is the main wood used in woodwind instruments.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Eine knackige Herbstfrucht. Das Holz des Birnenbaums ist das Hauptholz, das für Holzblasinstrumente verwendet wird.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: A crisp fall fruit. The wood of the pear tree is the main wood used in woodwind instruments.

DescriptionLocalization.ru: Сочный осенний фрукт. Древесина грушевого дерева является ключевой в создании деревянных духовых инструментов.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: A crisp fall fruit. The wood of the pear tree is the main wood used in woodwind instruments.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 清脆的秋果。梨树木是木管乐器的主要木材。
